input: Extract the current temperature and weather condition from Weather.com for New York City. URL: https://weather.com/weather/today/l/f892433d7660da170347398eb8e3d722d8d362fe7dd15af16ce88324e1b96e70

comment: The eval isn't that good because there is no one answer, but it is also a good eval because the answer is ambigious

input: Check if a 'Thank You' message appears on ExampleForm.com after submitting a feedback form. URL: https://exampleform.com/feedback
